907 references 591 472 593 these 594 595 596 597 would sizes 599 retrieval using 13 thus 18 480 an 483 484 1 243 2 486 miller 3 124 size 4 488 5 127 6 129 801 applicability must 805 806 relative 807 809 be 1363 490 491 492 493 375 search 378 1356 medlars by 810 812 term 813 814 so close 817 compared a 34 38 one 1374 i 1373 1372 l 381 1370 queries 382 the 1368 t 1004 1367 1366 820 w 1364 x 822 703 824 to 825 705 826 827 828 708 standard but 49 1264 retrieved 150 research retrieves 830 1377 1376 711 1375 956 has 715 836 51 958 52 53 which test 59 this 1396 161 164 grounds 168 600 721 722 1144 723 603 724 fixed 604 725 726 606 727 728 608 higher 609 69 rather searching for 1283 title primarily 175 paucity 176 298 not 730 610 731 611 732 1035 612 733 613 734 614 71 615 736 738 every 618 739 619 77 79 previous 1297 titles 1294 1051 1293 equal with 740 620 741 621 742 622 743 623 744 986 503 866 987 625 867 988 specially 626 989 506 507 508 629 509 tested 190 191 put 197 output number 870 630 510 752 william terms 511 512 633 754 1299 513 755 1298 91 514 636 637 879 517 518 639 greater efficiency method in lower index is 1195 system 520 883 642 522 523 524 525 gave 526 527 648 528 529 titleterms other indicated 650 530 531 894 534 recall 1078 657 659 1091 780 421 546 1089 307 429 choice economic 1405 before precision 790 that 553 554 676 than 315 1419 described commences relevant 1303 685 1302 202 565 686 445 566 1421 were 448 1427 technique their titlesearching 691 450 692 330 451 452 211 454 575 696 213 214 456 and 699 of 458 579 459 218 on allows or solicited 581 582 1327 1448 465 586 224 466 offsets 588 468 589 1208 1207
